Summary: There was no manager/maintenance person on site. The power was off when arrived. Had to wait 1/2 hour for it to get turned on. Sink drain was clogged. There were no glasses to drink from The bed was very uncomfortable/hard The heater quit during night. We found it was from lack of service. There was propane was provided for the fire pit. There were no wash cloths - only large towels. There were no dish rags or dish towels. There was no access to a broom, toilet brush or plunger.
Room tip:
The room was clean.
We feel this was priced 2x what it should have been based on the lack of...
